Deemos dodges.

"You want to hurt him, so I will not let you!" Deemos says.=
 He continues his retreat. Atma chases him, taking some shortcuts...
  ----=
- Original Message ----- 
  From: dcoburn 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent=
: Thursday, September 07, 2000 9:36 AM
  Subject: Re: The UNDER-World



  =
     
       My Groups | nbwrpg Main Page | Start a new group!  



  ::Dec=
adel::
   
        Decadel transformed and leaped away from Deemos.
   
   =
      "Hey buddy, kill the slaggin' bot!!!!  You actually think I still fig=
ht on the side of these idiots????  In fact, to show that I am no longer a =
Predacon under their authority, I'll do this!!!" Decadel said.  His shoulde=
r cannons popped out, "Stand back!!" He said, then he fired both of his pla=
sma shoulder cannons right at Pseudo!!
    ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
  From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, September =
07, 2000 7:53 PM
    Subject: Re: The UNDER-World





    Deemos reached d=
own and sliced Psuedo some. He spun around and ripped Psuedo from Decadel's=
 grip.

    "You really want this Predacon to die, don't you? You just may =
get your wish!" Deemos says...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      Fr=
om: dcoburn 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, September =
07, 2000 5:49 AM
      Subject: The UNDER-World





      ::Decadel::
    =
   
               Decadel put his book back on it's shelf.
       
       =
        "Stupid Predacons.  Who needs those idiots!!!" He said.  He walked =
over to Hell Drak.  He could sense a battle at the Predacon Cave.  He grabb=
ed Hell Drak and punched her in the face a couple times, enough to keep her=
 knocked out long enough.  He trapped her in a cell in his lair, and then d=
ug off to the battle.  
      (After time)
              Decadel was now un=
der Deemos, who was holding Pseudo.  Maximals.  Heh.  He may dislike his Pr=
edacon folk, but he HATES Maximals.  The Maximals wouldn't win!!!  They wil=
l lose!!!!!  Decadel jumped up out of the ground(He only goes underground i=
n beast mode), grabbed Pseudo with his tail, and squeezed him so hard he co=
uld practically make him cough out his spark, and pulled so hard that Deemo=
s might still be holding onto half of Pseudo, while the other half was ripp=
ed off(Not literally, this doesn't actually happen, but it feels like it!!!=
)
